name: major programming update
notification: The supply drop contained a major program update! (+[cultureAmount] culture)

name: new program
notification: The supply drop contained a brand new program to install!

name: computing chip cache
notification: Computing chips were contained in the supply drop, boosting research at our factories! (+[scienceAmount] science)

name: data surge
notification: Our unit has recovered an extensive amount of data from the supply drop! +[goldAmount] data

name: extensive combat logs
notification: Our unit recovered an extensive set of combat logs from the supply drop!

name: fatal ambush
notification: Our unit was lost to an ambush from rogue drones!

name: advanced unit recovery
notification: An advanced unit has been sent to join us!

name: receive geographical intel
notification: We have received data about nearby geography from the supply drop!
uniques: From a randomly chosen tile [5] tiles away from the ruins, reveal tiles up to [5] tiles away with [100]% chance

name: into era of greatness
notification: Solving a potential problem has elevated our corporation to a new era of greatness!
